title: Goblin Domain (1R175)
text:

Kind:	Shadow

Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Search. To play, spot a [Moria] minion. Plays to your support area. Each time a companion is played to site 4 or higher, that companion comes into play exhausted.
